# 向量化 ## 对应元素运算 ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} x<-1:10 y<-10:1 x+y ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 11 11 11 11 11 11 11 11 11 11 ``` ::: ::: ## 循环补足 ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} x<-rep(100,time=10) x + 1 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 101 101 101 101 101 101 101 101 101 101 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} x + 1:2 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 101 102 101 102 101 102 101 102 101 102 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} x + 1:3 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning in x + 1:3: longer object length is not a multiple of shorter object length ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 101 102 103 101 102 103 101 102 103 101 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} x + 1:4 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning in x + 1:4: longer object length is not a multiple of shorter object length ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 101 102 103 104 101 102 103 104 101 102 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} x + 1:5 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 101 102 103 104 105 101 102 103 104 105 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} data<-data.frame(x=1:6) data ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} data$y=c('A','B','C') data ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # data$z=1:5 报错，因为6不能被5整除 ``` :::
